name: GPT-4o Audio Preview (Oct 2024)
description: GPT-4o Audio Preview October 2024 release optimized for asynchronous audio input and output, with support for detecting audio nuances and sentiment in recordings.
notes: First audio preview release (October 1, 2024). Focused on text and audio modalities only. Does not support image/vision capabilities or structured outputs. Audio processing costs approximately $0.06 per minute for input and $0.24 per minute for output.
